results.byline: By HIROKO TABUCHI and DAVID GELLES
results.title: Doomed Boeing Jets Lacked 2 Safety Features That Company Sold Only as Extras
results.abstract: Airlines had to pay more for two optional upgrades that could warn pilots about sensor malfunctions. Boeing now plans to make one of the features standard.
des_facet: BOEING 737 MAX GROUNDINGS AND SAFETY CONCERNS (2019)

media.caption: Standard 737 Max planes are not equipped with a so-called angle of attack indicator or an angle of attack disagree light. The indicator will continue to cost airlines extra, but the light won’t.
